participant_1.background:
I don't own a car because I like to walk or ride my bike.
I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends.
i am going to school to get my bachelors degree.
i love to run fast.
I'm not good at keeping up with my exercise routine, but I know it's important for my health.

participant_2.background:
I have a rose garden in my backyard that I love to spend time in.
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry.
I am a 35-year-old father of two who enjoys spending time with my family.
i used to cheerlead in high school.
I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.

content.text: Hey there!
Hey! How's it going?
It's going well, thank you. I'm just getting ready to head out for a walk. What are you up to today?
I'm going to visit my sister and her kids, and maybe write some poetry later.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day. I love spending time with my nieces and nephews.
Me too. They're so much fun! Do you have any children?
No, I don't. I'm not sure if I want to have kids yet.
That's okay. It's a big decision. I'm glad I had kids, but it's not for everyone.
I know what you mean. I'm still young, so I have plenty of time to decide.
Exactly. And in the meantime, you can enjoy your freedom!
Exactly! So, what are you going to do after you visit your sister?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go for a walk in my rose garden.
That sounds lovely. I love rose gardens.
Me too. They're so beautiful.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a music teacher. I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're doing something you love.
Thanks! I am too.
What kind of music do you teach?
I teach piano, guitar, and voice.
That's great! I wish I could play the piano.
It's never too late to learn!
I know, but I'm not very good at it.
Everyone starts out not being very good at it. You just have to keep practicing.
I know. I'll try to get lessons sometime.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great piano player
